sentence.Network_en: The rebels bombed the munition factory.
The soldiers had plenty of arms and munition!

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a granted right or privilege): from French, from Latin munitio(n-) 'fortification', from munire 'fortify or secure'

means.word_mean: 2. defensive structure consisting of walls or mounds built around a stronghold to strengthen it
